patthana3.6:1.1_0: Noganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:2.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:4.1_0: Ganthaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:4.1_1: Ganthaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:4.1_2: Ganthaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho akusalo ca nogantho akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:5.1_0: Noganthaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:6.1_0: Ganthaṁ akusalañca noganthaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:7.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:8.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.6:10.1_0: Gantho akusalo dhammo ganthassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:11.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe…
patthana3.6:15.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.6:16.1_0: Noganthaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:19.1_0: Ganthaniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:20.1_0: Aganthaniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:21.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ, lokiyalokuttaragamanasadisaṁ.)
patthana3.6:23.1_0: Ganthaniyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:24.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:26.1_0: Ganthaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:27.1_0: Aganthaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:28.1_0: Ganthaniyaṁ abyākatañca aganthaniyaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:29.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ, lokiyalokuttaragamanasadisaṁ.)
patthana3.6:31.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:32.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:34.1_0: Ganthasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:35.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana3.6:36.1_0: Ganthasampayuttaṁ akusalañca ganthavippayuttaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:37.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:38.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha …pe…
patthana3.6:40.1_0: Ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo ganthasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:41.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte cha …pe…
patthana3.6:41.1_1: nissaye cha, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri …pe…
patthana3.6:42.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:43.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:45.1_0: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:46.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, avigate ekaṁ.
patthana3.6:48.1_0: Ganthañceva ganthaniyañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:49.1_0: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:50.1_0: Ganthañceva ganthaniyaṁ akusalañca ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:51.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:52.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:54.1_0: Gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthaniyassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:55.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe…
patthana3.6:59.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.6:60.1_0: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:61.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:63.1_0: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:64.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:65.1_0: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:67.1_0: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:68.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:72.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.6:73.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ ganthaniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:74.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ aganthaniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:75.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:77.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ ganthaniyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:80.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ ganthaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:81.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ aganthaniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:82.1_0: Ganthavippayuttaṁ ganthaniyaṁ abyākatañca ganthavippayuttaṁ aganthaniyaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:83.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.6:85.1_0: Ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo ganthavippayuttassa ganthaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:86.1_0: Ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo ganthavippayuttassa aganthaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:87.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme …pe…
patthana3.6:87.1_1: magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe…
patthana3.6:91.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
